text: "Oh Yeah" is a 1985 song by Swiss electronic band Yello. It was taken from their fourth studio album Stella. It went to number 8 in Australia, number 47 in Germany and number 51 in the United States. It was used in movies Ferris Bueller's Day Off, K-9 and The Secret of My Success. It has been in used in The Simpsons. Category:1985 songs Category:Electronic pop songs
title: Oh Yeah (Yello song)
